name: Green/Colour Screen Invaders C64
description:
1 Player Short Vertical Shooter for the C64, TheC64Maxi/Mini, Or C64 Emulator.

2 Versions of the Game, One that looks like your running the Game on a Green Screen Monitor (CBM PET Style), and the Other is your Normal C64 Multi-Colour Mode.

Features:

Weapon upgrades 4 Tier and you keep the last Power Up (Flashing "W" Icon).

Extra Life Collections (Flashing "Ship" Icon).

Chaos Wave Attacks, You need to play it to see Chaos in Action.

A Basic Final Boss and Ending Screen.

Made with help from the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Using a modified SEUCK Enhancement Framework code with Chaos Attack Wave Mode by me, Original Framework code by Richard Bayliss of TND, Music by Andrew Fisher (Merman).
